front.title: Recommendation for EAP methods used in wireless network access authentication

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This Recommendation specifies security requirements for authentication methods with key establishment supported by the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) defined in IETF RFC 3748 for wireless access authentications to federal networks.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
